headlines.description: Arsenal suffered a third successive defeat as they lost 3-0 at Leicester after seeing Ainsley Maitland-Niles red carded on 36 minutes.

video.headline: Arsenal continue to fall apart in race for 4th

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlight (Arsenal continue to fall apart in race for 4th) 2019/04/28 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal suffer third straight loss at Leicester

headlines.description: Manchester City returned to the top of the table after Sergio Aguero's goal earned them a 1-0 victory away at Burnley.

video.headline: Man City survive Burnley test to stay on course for glory

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlight (City survive Burnley test to stay on course for glory) 2019/04/28 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: City beat Burnley to go top with two games left

headlines.description: Manchester United goalkeeper David De Gea produced another blunder to gift Chelsea a 1-1 draw in the battle between the two top four hopefuls.

video.headline: Another David de Gea error leads to a Chelsea goal

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC One-play (Another David de Gea error leads to a Chelsea goal) 2019/04/28 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: De Gea howler jeopardises Utd's top-4 hopes
